definition: of a color at the end of the color spectrum (next to orange), a red the color of ripe cherries
details:
adjective
- of a color at the end of the color spectrum (next to orange)
= synonyms: crimson
noun
- a red the color of ripe cherries
= synonyms: cerise
- a red fruit with a single hard stone
- any of numerous trees and shrubs producing a small fleshy round fruit with a single hard stone
= synonyms: cherry tree
- wood of any of various cherry trees especially the black cherry
